elements.name: metadata
elements.title: Imagination Spectrum measures the vividness of your imagination across all senses (visual, sound, taste, touch, etc).

choices.text:
How well can you picture an apple in your mind’s eye? Or hear the sound of a trumpet playing in your mind’s ear? Do these sensory experiences resemble the actual experience or do they vaguely resemble the real experience?  

To start, make a prediction. Consider carefully this question: How vivid is your imagination?

elements.name: metadata
elements.description:
Look at the following image of a red apple then answer questions on the sensory experience that comes to mind when the image is no longer present. 

When ready, click start.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Image of the apple
elements.description: Imagine the apple as clearly as you can in your mind. Try to recreate the same image. Consider carefully the sensory experience that comes to mind.

choices.text: No image at all, I only know I am thinking of the apple
Perfectly realistic and as vivid as seeing the apple

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Details and unique characteristics of the apple
elements.description: Imagine the apple as clearly as you can in your mind. Try to recreate the same image. Consider carefully the sensory experience that comes to mind.

choices.text: No image at all, I only know I am thinking of the apple
Perfectly realistic and as vivid as seeing the apple

elements.title: Hold the apple in your hand
elements.description: Now imagine taking a bite out of the apple. Can you imagine what it’s like to...?

choices.text: No image at all, I only know I am thinking of the apple
Perfectly realistic and as vivid as seeing the apple

elements.name: metadata
elements.title: When ready, play the video.
elements.description:

When ready, click next.

elements.name: metadata
elements.title: When ready, play the sound.
elements.description: Listen to the sound of this flute then answer questions on the auditory experience that comes to mind when the sound is no longer present. Don’t worry about memorizing the tune. When ready, play the sound.

elements.name: metadata
elements.title: When ready, play the sound.
elements.description: Listen to the following guided visualization and try to imagine yourself walking along a quiet beach. When ready, settle into a comfortable position and press play.

choices.text: Imagine yourself walking along the shoreline of a quiet beach. The sun is shining brightly and feels so warm on your skin. While you walk, you feel your toes sink into the sand. The sand beneath your feet, feels smooth and the water warm. You watch as the waves roll onto the shore, leaving white froth as they recede back into the depths of the turquoise ocean. You hear the calming rhythm of the waves as they break on the shore. As you breathe in, the fresh ocean air fills your lungs completely. You can taste the salt of the ocean.  It is nearing sunset. The sun is sinking closer to the horizon. Its colour changing from bright yellow to orange – inching even closer to the horizon. As you gaze over the horizon, you notice a single star in the sky.dfdg
